text: Nilphamari () is a district in northern bengal of Bangladesh. It is part of the Rangpur Division. ==Subdistricts== Upazila (subdistrict) population Nilphamari Sadar (Bengali: ) 306051 Saidpur (Bengali: alt. spelling: Syedpur) 246201 Jaldhaka (Bengali: ) 233885 Kishoreganj (Bengali: ) 199422 Domar (Bengali: ) 187696 Dimla (Bengali: ) 175507 == Other websites == Category:Districts in Rangpur Division
title: Nilphamari District
